name: Resuffer: Down the Rabbit Hole
description:
When the rabbit lord ran out of armies, he collaborated with Prof. Lupus Rabbitson to create The Rabbit Hole; a group of lethal labyrinths built to turn his civilians to unbeatable troops. Nobody ever made it out of that training facility alive. So, could you be the exception?!GAMEPLAY
Resuffer is designed around precision both in its control and collision system. Your goal is to avoid obstacles by jumping, aerial turns, slow-motion, special abilities and keep going faster until you reach a certain speed that qualifies you to progress to the next labyrinth. The only universal rule down the Rabbit Hole: if you touch anything, you die immediately!KEY FEATURES
  • Elegant, minimalistic design.
  • Easy to pick up hard to master.
  • Tight, fluid, precise control.
  • Tough yet balanced difficulty.
  • Short, addictive gameplay loop.
  • Handcrafted, highly-tested levels.
  • Hundreds of gameplay hours.
  • Dynamic lighting, particle system.
  • Mouse, keyboard and joystick support.
